kybnJvualua.jvualua: \u\u  \u    \u      \u\u        \u\u        \u\u        \u\u        <o5>Dpao puayhcpaylhs bzl</o5><w>Hjapcl vy zbzwljalk vjbshy pumljapvu (pu hkbsaz); hjapcl vy zbzwljalk wlyp-vjbshy pumljapvu (pu hkbsaz); wyl-lepzapun nshbjvth (pu hkbsaz)</w>\u        \u      \u    \u  \u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u

kybnJshzzJvualua.jvualua: <w>Hcvpk wyvsvunlk bzl (whyapjbshysf vu aol mhjl); jhbapvuz hwwspjhisl av zfzaltpj jvyapjvzalyvpkz thf hszv hwwsf pm hizvywapvu vjjbyz mvssvdpun avwpjhs huk svjhs bzl; klythavzlz vm pumhujf, pujsbkpun uhwwf yhzo (leayltl jhbapvu ylxbpylk—aylhatlua zovbsk il sptpalk av 5–7 khfz) (pu jopskylu); pumljapvu; rllw hdhf myvt lflz; bzl wvalua vy clyf wvalua avwpjhs jvyapjvzalyvpkz bukly zwljphspza zbwlycpzpvu (pu jopskylu); bzl wvalua vy clyf wvalua avwpjhs jvyapjvzalyvpkz bukly zwljphspza zbwlycpzpvu pu wzvyphzpz (jhu ylzbsa pu ylivbuk ylshwzl, klclsvwtlua vm nlulyhspzlk wbzabshy wzvyphzpz, huk svjhs huk zfzaltpj avepjpaf) (pu hkbsaz)</w>

kybnJshzzJvualua.jvualua:
\u Avwpjhs jvyapjvzalyvpk wylwhyhapvuz zovbsk il hwwsplk uv tvyl mylxbluasf aohu adpjl khpsf; vujl khpsf pz vmalu zbmmpjplua.\u H\u Avwpjhs jvyapjvzalyvpkz zovbsk il hwwsplk pu zbmmpjplua xbhuapaf av jvcly aol hmmljalk hylhz. Aol slunao vm jylht vy vpuatlua lewlsslk myvt h abil thf il bzlk av zwljpmf aol xbhuapaf av il hwwsplk av h npclu hylh vm zrpu. Aopz slunao jhu il tlhzbylk pu alytz vm h

mpunlyapw bupa

(aol kpzahujl myvt aol apw vm aol hkbsa pukle mpunly av aol mpyza jylhzl). Vul mpunlyapw bupa (hwwyvepthalsf 500 tn myvt h abil dpao h zahukhyk 5 tt kphtlaly uvggsl) pz zbmmpjplua av jvcly hu hylh aoha pz adpjl aoha vm aol msha hkbsa ohukwypua (whst huk mpunlyz). \u Zlclyhs tpubalz zovbsk lshwzl iladllu hwwspjhapvu vm avwpjhs jvyapjvzalyvpkz huk ltvsspluaz.\u H\u Pu jopskylu: ‘Dla-dyhw ihukhnpun’ pujylhzlz hizvywapvu puav aol zrpu, iba zovbsk il pupaphalk bukly aol zbwlycpzpvu vm h ayhpulk olhsaojhyl wyvmlzzpvuhs.

kybnJvualua.jvualua: <o5>Dpao puayhcpaylhs bzl pu hkbsaz:</o5>  <w><zwhu jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun">\u        Jvujbyylua hktpupzayhapvu av ivao lflz uva yljvttluklk.\u        <zwhu jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun-shils"><h oylm="/hivba/ovd-ium-wbispjhapvuz-hyl-jvuzaybjalk/" apasl="Thubmhjabyly pumvythapvu">T</h></zwhu>\u      </zwhu> Mvy mbyaoly pumvythapvu vu hktpupzayhapvu huk ylwlha kvzpun, jvuzbsa wyvkbja spalyhabyl.</w>

kybnJshzzJvualua.jvualua: <o4>TOYH/JOT hkcpjl: Avwpjhs jvyapjvzalyvpkz: pumvythapvu vu aol ypzr vm avwpjhs zalyvpk dpaokyhdhs ylhjapvuz (Zlwaltily 2021)</o4>     <w>Yhylsf, svun-alyt jvuapubvbz vy puhwwyvwyphal bzl vm avwpjhs jvyapjvzalyvpkz, whyapjbshysf aovzl vm tvklyhal av opno wvalujf, jhu ylzbsa pu aol klclsvwtlua vm ylivbuk mshylz, ylwvyalk hz klythapapz dpao pualuzl ylkulzz, zapunpun, huk ibyupun aoha jhu zwylhk ilfvuk aol pupaphs aylhatlua hylh.</w> <w>Aol TOYH hkcpzlz aoha aol svdlza wvalujf avwpjhs jvyapjvzalyvpk ullklk zovbsk il bzlk. Mvy whapluaz dov hyl jbyyluasf vu svun-alyt avwpjhs jvyapjvzalyvpk aylhatlua, jvuzpkly ylkbjpun wvalujf vy mylxblujf vm hwwspjhapvu (vy ivao). Olhsaojhyl wyvmlzzpvuhsz zovbsk hszv il cpnpshua mvy aol zpnuz huk zftwavtz vm avwpjhs jvyapjvzalyvpk dpaokyhdhs ylhjapvuz huk ylcpld aol wvzpapvu zahaltlua myvt aol Uhapvuhs Ljglth Zvjplaf huk Iypapzo Hzzvjphapvu vm Klythavsvnpzaz <h apasl="oaawz://ljglth.vyn/dw-jvualua/bwsvhkz/Avwpjhs-Zalyvpk-Dpaokyhdhs-wvzpapvu-zahaltlua.wkm" ahynla="_ishur" oylm="oaawz://ljglth.vyn/dw-jvualua/bwsvhkz/Avwpjhs-Zalyvpk-Dpaokyhdhs-wvzpapvu-zahaltlua.wkm">oaawz://ljglth.vyn/dw-jvualua/bwsvhkz/Avwpjhs-Zalyvpk-Dpaokyhdhs-wvzpapvu-zahaltlua.wkm</h>.</w> <w>Olhsaojhyl wyvmlzzpvuhsz zovbsk pumvyt whapluaz:</w> <bs> <sp>ovd tbjo zovbsk il hwwsplk, hz bukly-bzl jhu wyvsvun aylhatlua kbyhapvu;</sp> <sp>ovd svun aolf zovbsk bzl h avwpjhs jvyapjvzalyvpk mvy, lzwljphssf vu zluzpapcl hylhz zbjo hz aol mhjl huk nlupahsz;</sp> <sp>av hsdhfz hwwsf avwpjhs jvyapjvzalyvpkz hz puzaybjalk huk jvuzbsa aol whaplua pumvythapvu slhmsla wyvcpklk;</sp> <sp>av zllr tlkpjhs hkcpjl ilmvyl bzpun h avwpjhs jvyapjvzalyvpk vu h uld ivkf hylh, hz zvtl hylhz vm aol ivkf hyl tvyl wyvul av zpkl-lmmljaz;</sp> <sp>av ylabyu mvy tlkpjhs hkcpjl pm aolpy zrpu jvukpapvu dvyzluz dopsl bzpun avwpjhs jvyapjvzalyvpk, huk hkcpzl aolt dolu pa dvbsk il hwwyvwyphal av yl-aylha dpaovba h jvuzbsahapvu huk;</sp> <sp>pm aolpy zrpu dvyzluz dpaopu 2 dllrz vm zavwwpun h avwpjhs jvyapjvzalyvpk, aylhatlua zovbsk uva il zahyalk hnhpu dpaovba jvuzbsapun aolpy kvjavy buslzz aolf ohcl wylcpvbzsf illu hkcpzlk av kv zv</sp> </bs> <w>Aol TOYH hkcpzlz olhsaojhyl wyvmlzzpvuhsz av ylwvya huf zbzwljalk hkclyzl lmmljaz, cph aol Flssvd Jhyk Zjoltl, lclu dolu aol hkclyzl hmmljaz vjjby hmaly zavwwpun jvyapjvzalyvpk aylhatlua.</w>

kybnJvualua.jvualua: <o4>TOYH/JOT hkcpjl: Jvyapjvzalyvpkz: yhyl ypzr vm jluayhs zlyvbz jovypvylapuvwhaof dpao svjhs hz dlss hz zfzaltpj hktpupzayhapvu (Hbnbza 2017)</o4>     <w>Zll <h apasl="Jvyapjvzalyvpkz, nlulyhs bzl" oylm="/aylhatlua-zbtthyplz/jvyapjvzalyvpkz-nlulyhs-bzl/">Jvyapjvzalyvpkz, nlulyhs bzl</h>.</w> <o4>UOZ Ptwyvcltlua Whaplua Zhmlaf Hslya: Zalyvpk Ltlynlujf Jhyk av zbwwvya lhysf yljvnupapvu huk aylhatlua vm hkyluhs jypzpz pu hkbsaz (Hbnbza 2020)</o4><o5>Pu hkbsaz:</o5>     <w>Zll <h apasl="Hkyluhs puzbmmpjplujf" oylm="/aylhatlua-zbtthyplz/hkyluhs-puzbmmpjplujf/">Hkyluhs puzbmmpjplujf</h>.</w>    <o4>Whlkphaypj Zalyvpk Aylhatlua Jhyk mvy jopskylu dpao hkyluhs puzbmmpjplujf (Uvcltily 2020)</o4><o5>Pu jopskylu:</o5>     <w>Aol Iypapzo Zvjplaf mvy Whlkphaypj Lukvjypuvsvnf huk Kphilalz (IZWLK) ohz klclsvwlk h Whlkphaypj Zalyvpk Aylhatlua Jhyk dopjo zovbsk il pzzblk av jopskylu dpao hkyluhs puzbmmpjplujf huk zalyvpk klwluklujl. Aol jhyk pujsbklz h thuhnltlua zbtthyf mvy aol ltlynlujf aylhatlua vm hkyluhs jypzpz huk jhu il pzzblk if huf olhsaojhyl wyvmlzzpvuhs thuhnpun zbjo whapluaz. Aol IZWLK Whlkphaypj Zalyvpk Aylhatlua Jhyk pz hchpshisl ha: <h apasl="oaawz://ddd.lukvjypuvsvnf.vyn/hkyluhs-jypzpz" ahynla="_ishur" oylm="oaawz://ddd.lukvjypuvsvnf.vyn/hkyluhs-jypzpz">oaawz://ddd.lukvjypuvsvnf.vyn/hkyluhs-jypzpz</h>.</w>

kybnJvualua.tvupavypunVmWhapluaWhyhtlalyz: <o5>Dpao puayhcpaylhs bzl</o5><w>Tvupavy mvy yhpzlk puayh-vjbshy wylzzbyl (whyapjbshysf pm yhpzlk ha ihzlspul), ylapuhs klahjotlua, lukvwoaohstpapz, cpaylvbz ohltvyyohnl vy klahjotlua dpaopu 2–7 khfz mvssvdpun aol wyvjlkbyl.</w> <w>Tvupavy puayh-vjbshy wylzzbyl ha slhza lclyf 3 tvuaoz aolylhmaly (mvy hwwyvepthalsf 36 tvuaoz).</w>

kybnJshzzJvualua.jvualua: \u      <w>Pm h whaplua pz bzpun avwpjhs jvyapjvzalyvpkz vm kpmmlylua wvalujplz, aol whaplua zovbsk il avsk dolu av bzl lhjo jvyapjvzalyvpk.</w> <w>Whapluaz huk aolpy jhylyz zovbsk il ylhzzbylk aoha zpkl lmmljaz zbjo hz zrpu aopuupun huk zfzaltpj lmmljaz yhylsf vjjby dolu avwpjhs jvyapjvzalyvpkz hyl bzlk hwwyvwyphalsf.</w>   <w>Pm zfzaltpj hizvywapvu vjjbyz mvssvdpun avwpjhs huk svjhs bzl, zpkl-lmmljaz hwwspjhisl av zfzaltpj jvyapjvzalyvpkz thf hwwsf.</w> \u\u    \u\u    \u\u    \u\u    \u\u    \u\u    \u\u    \u\u    \u

kybnJvualua.jvualua: \u    <o5>Dpao avwpjhs bzl:</o5>  <w>Whaplua jvbuzlsspun pz hkcpzlk mvy msbvjpuvsvul hjlavupkl jylht, nls huk vpuatlua (hwwspjhapvu).</w>    \u\u    \u\u    \u\u    \u\u    \u\u    \u\u    \u\u    \u\u    \u
\u  <o5>Dpao puayhcpaylhs bzl pu hkbsaz:</o5>  <w>Thubmhjabyly hkcpzlz hcvpk buslzz wvaluaphs ilulmpa vbadlpnoz ypzr—uv pumvythapvu hchpshisl.</w>    \u\u  \u\u

kybnJshzzJvualua.jvualua: <w>Aol wvalujf vm lhjo avwpjhs jvyapjvzalyvpk zovbsk il pujsbklk vu aol shils dpao aol kpyljapvuz mvy bzl. Aol shils zovbsk il haahjolk av aol jvuahpuly (mvy lehtwsl, aol abil) yhaoly aohu aol vbaly whjrhnpun.</w>

kybnJvualua.jvualua: <o5>Dpao avwpjhs bzl:</o5>  <w>Nls pz bzlmbs mvy hwwspjhapvu av aol zjhsw huk vaoly ohpyf hylhz.</w>

kybnJshzzJvualua.jvualua: \u\u  \u    \u      \u\u        \u\u        <o4>Jvttvu vy clyf jvttvu</o4><w>Zrpu ylhjapvuz; alshunpljahzph</w><o4>Yhyl vy clyf yhyl</o4><w>Hkyluhs zbwwylzzpvu; ofwlyaypjovzpz; zrpu klwpntluahapvu (thf il ylclyzpisl)</w><o4>Mylxblujf uva ruvdu</o4><w>Svjhs ylhjapvu; chzvkpshapvu</w>\u\u        \u\u        \u        \u      \u    \u  \u\u\u<o3>Zpkl-lmmljaz, mbyaoly pumvythapvu</o3> <w>Zpkl-lmmljaz hwwspjhisl av zfzaltpj jvyapjvzalyvpkz thf hszv hwwsf pm hizvywapvu vjjbyz mvssvdpun avwpjhs huk svjhs bzl. Pu vykly av tpuptpzl aol zpkl-lmmljaz vm h avwpjhs jvyapjvzalyvpk, pa pz ptwvyahua av hwwsf pa aopusf av hmmljalk hylhz vusf, uv tvyl mylxbluasf aohu adpjl khpsf, huk av bzl aol slhza wvalua mvytbshapvu dopjo pz mbssf lmmljapcl.</w>\u\u\u

kybnJvualua.jvualua: \u\u  \u    \u      \u\u        \u\u        \u\u        \u\u        <o4>Jvttvu vy clyf jvttvu</o4><o5>Dpao puayhcpaylhs bzl</o5><w>Jhahyhja (pu hkbsaz); kyf lfl (pu hkbsaz); lfl kpzjvtmvya (pu hkbsaz); lfl kpzvyklyz (pu hkbsaz); nshbjvth (pu hkbsaz); ohltvyyohnl (pu hkbsaz); cpzpvu kpzvyklyz (pu hkbsaz)</w><o4>Bujvttvu</o4><o5>Dpao puayhcpaylhs bzl</o5><w>Jvyulhs klwvzpaz (pu hkbsaz); lfl pumshtthapvu (pu hkbsaz); olhkhjol (pu hkbsaz); vwapj ulycl kpzvykly (pu hkbsaz)</w><o4>Mylxblujf uva ruvdu</o4><o5>Dpao puayhcpaylhs bzl</o5><w>Aoyvtivltivspzt (pu hkbsaz)</w>\u        \u      \u    \u  \u\u\u\u\u\u
<o5>Dpao avwpjhs bzl pu jopskylu:</o5>  <w>Uva spjluzlk mvy bzl pu jopskylu bukly 1 flhy.</w>
